ModMetaData.name: Cupro's Alloys (Continued)

ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img] Update of The White Crayons mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1543189281
- Sorted the floors into four groups since that was requested in the original mod. [list] [*] Basic [*] Advanced [*] Utility [*] Decorative [/list]
- Added the possibility of buildning conduits and components of copper and aluminium and not just steel. - Added support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1554804570]Metals+[/url] - Added support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2131576786]Fueled Smelter + Crematorium(continued)[/url] - Verified CE-support'

Adds new mid-game/end-game alloyed metals for creating buildings, weapons, and art.
The B19 version can be found [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1474904096]here.[/url]
[h1]Thanks to cuproPanda[/h1] Please note that the original source and mod was created by [b]cuproPanda.[/b] His work on this mod finished with B18, so I've forked his code to update this mod at community request.
[h1]Workshop ID:[/h1] 1543189281
[h1]Items Added:[/h1] [b]Base Metals:[/b] Copper Lead Tin Aluminum Nickel Zinc Bismuth Chromium
Recipes make 10 ingots. [b]Utility Alloys:[/b] Plumchalcum: 8 lead, 2 copper Duralumin: 9 aluminum, 1 copper Zamak: 8 aluminum, 2 zinc Bismuth Bronze: 6 copper, 2 zinc, 2 bismuth Bronze: 9 copper, 1 tin/zinc Cupronickel: 8 copper, 2 nickel Stainless Steel: 8 steel, 1 nickel, 1 chromium Hepatzion: 6 copper, 10 silver, 10 gold
[b]Decorative Alloys:[/b] Brass: 9 copper, 1 aluminum/zinc Chrome-Plated Steel: 18 steel, 1 nickel, 1 chromium (makes 20) Aurichalcum: 8 copper, 10 gold Sterling Silver: 35 silver, 3 copper Rose Gold: 35 gold, 3 copper Electrum: 25 gold, 25 silver
[b]Advanced Alloys:[/b] Black Steel: 6 stainless steel, 4 hepatzion Plastin: 4 tin, 4 plasteel, 2 bismuth bronze
[h1]Save Compatability[/h1] This mod will work with existing saves, but all of the resources will have to be purchased from traders or mined using my Quarry mod. Always back up your saves before adding new mods as there is always the possibility for issues.
[h1]Mod Compatability - Not tested for 1.0 but no logic has changed[/h1] [b]Architect Sense:[/b] All floors are grouped together [b]Combat Extended:[/b] Metals are regrouped to be usable for weapon crafting [b]Industrialisation:[/b] Copper and Aluminium are usable in recipes [b]Survivalist's Additions:[/b] Forge/Crucible can be used to make alloys No known issues yet, please report any issues
[h1]Older Versions and Update Notes[/h1] All versions of this mod can be found on cuproPanda's [url=https://github.com/cuproPanda/Cupros-Alloys/releases]GitHub[/url]. Each release has info on what has changed from the previous release. Source for this mod can be found on my [url=https://github.com/Benjamin-S/Cupros-Alloys]GitHub[/url]
